mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user( nick_name, portrait, sex, unionid, real_name, phone_no, city_id, id_card, address, create_date ) SELECT #{nickName}, #{portrait}, #{sex}, #{unionid}, #{realName}, #{phoneNo}, #{cityId}, #{idCard}, #{address}, #{createDate} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM t_user WHERE `unionid` = #{unionid})
mapper.select:
SELECT b.id, b.nick_name AS nickName, b.phone_no AS phoneNo, b.portrait, b.sex, b.real_name as realName, b.create_date as createDate, u.user_type as userType, b.address, count(o.id) as orderCount FROM t_user b LEFT JOIN t_user_info u ON u.user_base_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_order o on u.id = o.userId and o.`status` = 1 WHERE 1=1
AND ( b.nick_name LIKE concat('%',#{queryStr},'%') or b.phone_no = #{queryStr} )
AND to_days(b.create_date) = to_days(#{createDate})
GROUP BY b.id, b.nick_name, b.phone_no, b.portrait, b.sex, b.real_name, b.create_date, u.user_type, b.address order by b.create_date desc

SELECT b.id, b.nick_name AS nickName, b.phone_no AS phoneNo, b.portrait, b.sex, b.real_name AS realName, b.create_date AS createDate, u.user_type AS userType, b.address FROM t_user b JOIN t_user_info u ON u.user_base_id = b.id WHERE u.user_type = 1 ORDER BY b.create_date DESC LIMIT 0,3

SELECT b.id, b.nick_name AS nickName, b.phone_no AS phoneNo, b.portrait, b.sex, b.real_name as realName, b.create_date as createDate, u.user_type as userType, b.address, count(o.id) as orderCount FROM t_user b LEFT JOIN t_user_info u ON u.user_base_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_order o on u.id = o.userId and o.`status` = 1 WHERE b.id = #{id} order by b.create_date
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user set real_name=#{realName}, id_card=#{idCard}, city_id=#{cityId}, nick_name=#{nickName}, phone_no=#{phoneNo}, portrait=#{portrait}, address=#{address}, sex=#{sex}, update_date = now() WHERE id=#{id}
